name: .LIBZIP File Extension
summary: Learn about .LIBZIP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a LIBZIP file with TechSmith Camtasia in Windows and macOS. To open a LIBZIP file with Camtasia, select File → Library → Import Zipped Library.

Since LIBZIP files are compressed with Zip compression, you can also decompress them with a Zip utility, then extract their contents. You may need to change their file extension from .libzip to .zip before decompressing them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
